name: Turning Point Foundation, Nature Care and Drug Rehabilitation Centre
briefDescription: Turning Point Foundation (TPF) is a non profit, voluntary and registered organization working in the field of Health and Social Development. It intervenes in issues related to drug abuse and HIV/AIDS. The cost effective services of our institutions and outreach activities are benefited by the general public especially the low income group (poor) of our society.It provide indoor treatment services to 250 Drugs/Alcohol dependents in every year through its Drug De addiction and rehabilitation centre at DelhiIt also provides medical and psycho-social support to 600 Injecting Drug Users and their family members who are vulnerable to HIV/AIDS at PanipatTPF also conduct HIV/AIDS and Drugs/alcohol prevention camps in vulnerable colonies of Delhi and Haryana
